column4: can i download somewhere a compiled kernel 2.6.16 with smp support?
Is there a specific reason you need 2.6.16 ? Thing break with kernels after 2.5.16 . The non-server install of ubuntu comes with SMP compiled in the kernel

lets say it in a short way: ubuntu sucks ass and is not usable for me atm, it randomly crashes (with nv, and nvidia) i cant find out why, my hardware is ok and the last thing i want to try now is another kernel
